Manterror/Ramhorn/Double Punch/Injector/Stinkbomb:

::Everyone in the room looked up as a shot hit the other control panel, 
provided by Sniper::
::The panel exploded, then all of their optics looked to the other one, where 
new red letters were::   :

ENERGY BUILD UP DEPLETED, FIVE MEGA-CYCLES UNTIL NEW BUILD UP, IMMEDIATE 
MINOR REPAIRS REQUESTED, EXCESS ENERGY IN SHIELDS

::The shields go up again, then with a visble shake in the shields, the 
shields go down, the energy not being right to use for the shields::

0000

::Injector fired a missile at Sniper, running out of the engine room, 
followed by a limping Manterror, who gave Stinkbomb a final kick::

"Ugh!" Stinkbomb yelled, still grabbing onto his tail.

"Ha!" ::manterror yelled::

::Ramhorn ran over to Stinkbomb::

------=======------

::Double Punch walked into the next room, two autoguns coming down and firing 
at him::
::Doing a backflip, Double Punch landed on his back, kicking hard, he slid 
across the floor, firing a missile in between the autoguns::
::The autoguns exploded, Double Punch sliding back into the room that Hell 
Beast was in::
